Class.name: ErrorHandler
Class.summary: Represents an implementation of the interface for handling exceptions.

Static.name: Create[Func<Exception, Boolean>]
Static.summary: Creates a new instance of with the specified error handling function.
Static.param: The function that handles exceptions. It should return true if the exception is successfully handled; otherwise, false.

Instance.name: Handle[Exception]
Instance.summary: Handles the specified exception using the configured error handling function.
Instance.returns: True if the exception was successfully handled; otherwise, false.
